WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a duplicate one way or another.For those with the Web Client Exception of "Too many redirections were attempted", this issue will be fixed for the next release.  See http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=16520For those with the Web Client Exception of "No Exception", this is an issue with the EU armory being down, see http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=16534
WorkItem.Description:
I cannot get my char from armory since this weeks armory maintance. Message:
Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?
 
Armory works at:
http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Die+ewige+Wacht&n=Sahkyo&rhtml=true
 
But it does not work at the adress I used until last week:
http://armory.wow-europe.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Die+ewige+Wacht&n=Sahkyo
 
So it seems Blizzard has disabled some of the redirect adresses - maybe the one rawr uses is not working. Is there a possibillity to change the URL Rawr uses?
WorkItem.Summary: Cannot load Char from EU Armory

Comments.Message: I have got the very same exact problem

Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?
Web Client Exception: Too many automatic redirections were attempted.

Step Name: Load from Armory
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?

Armory works fine at: http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Silvermoon&n=Phoo

Rawr works fine if I add a character from the US Armory but no character works on the EU

From www.wow-heroes.com administrators. They have fixed the problem in their side.

There's a "problem" with EU armory since yesterday, they are internally redirecting all requests to from
http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml
to
https://eu.battle.net/login/login.xml?r ... -sheet.xml and then back to
http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml
and our bot wasn't being redirected through that new connection. We made a quick fix on our side so everything should be working fine now, thanks for your patience :)
This is fixed in the next release of Rawr. Just need to find out when it's released!

Rawr is also working fine for me when i import a character from the US servers, but NOT when i try with an EU character.

Despite robstein saying a fix has been implemented, it still doesn't work. Do we have any sort of ETA or update we can download?
I have the same problem as described above ...

Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?
Exception: No Exception
Web Client: Exception: Too many automatic redirections where attempted.
